Say Goodbye to Spreadsheets

Creator Studio is a browser extension that handles all the work for you, Our new data analytics tool for webtoon allows you to set yourself up for success. You'll spend less time logging and more time maximising the value of your comics potential to grow.

Chrome Firefox

Features

Easy Integration

We show up right on the webtoon dashboard, so no need to add another website to your bookmarks tab

Clearly Communicated

Data is displayed in simple visually accessible formats, No guesswork required

Track Reader Engagement

Know what your readers are saying about your webtoon, when they're typically reading and

Long Term Data Tracking

We keep track of your data over time, so you can see how your webtoon is growing.

Data Safe

We sell none of your comic data to third parties. It's yours and yours alone.

Dedicated Support

We have multiple social platforms for outreach including discord and twitter, along with an easy to use report system built into the extension

Say Hello to your new Future
